sn34.35-40:4.3: samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo …
sn34.35-40:4.4: neva samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34.35-40:4.5: samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca.
sn34.35-40:6.1: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva cattālīsamā kallitamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā cha suttāni pūretabbāni.
